transportAdvice: The historic walled city and Getseman√≠ neighborhood are compact and walkable, making foot travel practical for most tourist areas. Taxis and motorcycle taxis are widely available, and air-conditioned minibuses serve broader routes, though negotiating fares in advance is advisable.

weather.description: One of the driest and most pleasant months, with reliable sunshine and refreshing coastal breezes.
Dry and sunny with low humidity by Cartagena standards, ideal for sightseeing and beach visits.
Warm and mostly dry, with temperatures beginning to climb toward the hotter season.
The transition into the rainy season begins, with occasional afternoon showers and rising humidity.
Rainfall increases noticeably, with frequent afternoon and evening downpours amid persistent heat.
A wetter month with regular heavy showers, though mornings are often clear and hot.
A brief drier spell within the rainy season, with strong trade winds providing some relief from the heat.
Similar to July with a mix of sun and showers; humidity remains high throughout the month.
One of the wettest months of the year, with heavy and frequent rainfall expected most days.
Peak of the rainy season with the highest rainfall totals; flooding in low-lying areas is possible.
Rainfall begins to ease toward the end of the month as the dry season approaches.
The dry season returns, bringing sunny skies and lower humidity, making it a popular time to visit.
